name: Party Please
description:
Party Please

Uh-Oh! Got kicked out of the bar again? It sucks that only you got kicked out but your friends are still inside. Think you can sneak your way back in without the bouncers noticing? Good Luck!

Theme: Stealth + Dance

Trying to be stealthy while dancing usually would never seem to work...unless you're hiding in plain sight. That's what you need to do in Party Please to get back to your friends. Dance your way through the crowds to avoid getting noticed by the bouncers...hopefully, you can make it back to your friends before they see and before the clock runs out.

How to Play

Basic Movement: Left and Right Keys

Dance: E 

Roll: Click/Left Shift

Group Name: WorkingTitle

Julianna Da Silva, Linda Tieu, Kyatheswar Amudhala, & Zeeshan Baig
